title: ANI ONT THERSHOLD CONFIGURATION COMMAND
description: This command edits provisioning data associated with an ONT ANI.
user_level:
The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.
syntax: > configure ani ont ( no tca-thresh (ont-idx) ) | ( tca-thresh (ont-idx) [ no lower-optical-th | lower-optical-th <Gpon::OpticalthreshLow> ] [ no upper-optical-th | upper-optical-th <Gpon::OpticalthreshHigh> ] [ no rssi-profile | rssi-profile <Gpon::RssiProfileId> ] )

command_parameters.name: [no] lower-optical-th
command_parameters.description: indicates the optical level the ONT uses to declare the Low received.Value 0.5 dBm means ONT internal choice which would be MIB default 1 optional parameter with default value: 0.5 - optical level ONT uses to declare the low recieved - unit: dBm - range: [-127...0.5]

command_parameters.name: [no] upper-optical-th
command_parameters.description: indicates the optical level the ONT uses to declare the High received.Value 0.5 dBm means ONT internal choice which would be MIB default 1 optional parameter with default value: 0.5 - optical level ONT uses to declare the high recieved - unit: dBm - range: [-127...0.5]

command_parameters.name: [no] rssi-profile
command_parameters.description: an unique index of the rssi profile(0-200) optional parameter with default value: "0" - an unique index value for the rssi profile(0-200 configurable) - range: [0...200] DS-LIN-TEST-01:automationuser>#

raw:
help configure ani ont tca-thresh
ANI ONT THERSHOLD CONFIGURATION COMMAND
=======================================

Command Description
-------------------

This command edits provisioning data associated with an ONT ANI.


User Level
----------

The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.

Command Syntax
--------------

The command has the following syntax:
> configure ani ont ( no tca-thresh (ont-idx) ) | ( tca-thresh (ont-idx) [ no 
lower-optical-th | lower-optical-th <Gpon::OpticalthreshLow> ] [ no 
upper-optical-th | upper-optical-th <Gpon::OpticalthreshHigh> ] [ no 
rssi-profile | rssi-profile <Gpon::RssiProfileId> ] )

Command Parameters
------------------

Table "ANI ONT Thershold Configuration Command" Resource Parameters

Resource Identifier        Description

(ont-idx)                  ont index

Table "ANI ONT Thershold Configuration Command" Command Parameters

Parameter                  Description

[no] lower-optical-th      indicates the optical level the ONT uses to declare 
the Low received.Value 0.5 dBm means ONT internal choice which would be MIB 
default 1
                           optional parameter with default value: 0.5

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::OpticalthreshLow>
                           Format:
                           - optical level ONT uses to declare the low recieved
                           - unit: dBm
                           - range: [-127...0.5]

[no] upper-optical-th      indicates the optical level the ONT uses to declare 
the High received.Value 0.5 dBm means ONT internal choice which would be MIB 
default 1
                           optional parameter with default value: 0.5

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::OpticalthreshHigh>
                           Format:
                           - optical level ONT uses to declare the high recieved
                           - unit: dBm
                           - range: [-127...0.5]

[no] rssi-profile          an unique index of the rssi profile(0-200)
                           optional parameter with default value: "0"

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::RssiProfileId>
                           Format:
                           - an unique index value for the rssi profile(0-200 
configurable)
                           - range: [0...200]


DS-LIN-TEST-01:automationuser>#
